#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int test,mat[200][200],n;
int i,j;
int row[200]={0},col[200]={0},r,c,posr,posc;

cin>>test;
while(test--)
{
    cin>>n;
    r=0;c=0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        col[i]=0;
        row[i]=0;
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            cin>>mat[i][j];
            row[i]+=mat[i][j];
            col[j]+=mat[i][j];
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
    //cout<<"sum of row"<<i+1<<"= "<<row[i]<<endl<<"sum of col"<<i+1<<"= "<<col[i]<<endl;
    if(row[i]%2!=0)
    {
    r++;posr=i;
    }
    if(col[i]%2!=0)
    {
    c++;posc=i;
    }

    }
    if(r==0&&c==0)
    cout<<"1\n";
    else if(r>1||c>1)
    cout<<"0\n";
    else if( (r==1 && c==0)||(c==1&&r==0) )
    cout<<"0\n";
    else
    printf("(%d,%d)\n",posr+1,posc+c);
}

return 0;
}
